website_summaries.verdict: This leave-in adapter delivers reliable high-speed performance.
pros: Provides a blazing fast connection of up to 1,200Mbps and is easy to install
A great option for upgrading older laptops or computers
cons: Some customers had difficulty reaching high speeds

customer_reviews.title: Works on HP Windows 10 PC
customer_reviews.text: Reason this USB WiFi Adapter rates an overall 3 is we had to speak over phone to a computer tech to make this adapter work on our PC. The installation instructions were simple and we followed them. However, after multiple attempts to connect to our WiFi and failing; we called a computer tech we know. After 2 1/2 hrs.; this Tech helped us overcome the problems with connecting. The NETGEAR Adapter works fine now. Hopefully, if you purchase this Adapter you can either get help installing it, or your a techie pro.
customer_reviews.author: gamerlove

customer_reviews.title: Strong signals, fast transfer in small package
customer_reviews.text: Loving this little wifi dongle. Small but delivers! Able to now get a lot closer to my isp advertised speeds. Had an older tplink dongle only delivering ~170mbs even though isp package is 300mbs. With this replacement, I am pulling ~270-310mbs depending on who else may be using the internet at same time. Stronger signals, faster transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Total Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't even install. I installed the drivers twice, the device was never recognized. It's 2020... installing a USB WiFi adapter shouldn't require a call to tech support. For the price I paid for this, I was expecting a premium product from Netgear. Very disappointed. It's going back!
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Instruction to install are easy to follow and install. I have both 4.5 and 5G wifi signal. With this adapter, the connection is slower on 4.5G than the 5G and takes about a sec to load up. Even with 5G, I feel like it slower than the usual wifi connection that comes with the devices. But worth the price for devices that doesn't come with wifi connection.
customer_reviews.author: Troy You

customer_reviews.title: Best upgrade for an older laptop that doesn't support 802.11ac
customer_reviews.text: I have an older ThinkPad with SSD and i7 that is still pretty fast but the N-only Wi-Fi limits the responsiveness of online work. This adapter makes it feel like I got a new laptop. It is small and works without a hitch. The measured bandwidth of a laptop with built-in 802.11ac and this adapter is the same.
customer_reviews.author: dotsnail

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: 7/18/2019 Tech support got back to me as follows: "First of all, I would like to apologize for the late response. Your case was not routed immediately to the correct queue. I will personally report this to the appropriate department to avoid such instance." 6/5/2019 Im sure it's and awesome addition. Had an issue after install, emailed support for no answer. One of these days will figure it out. Hey Netgear. If you don't understand English just say so.... it's okay...way better than a zero response to a written request.
customer_reviews.author: Josey

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Piece of Garbage - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product is an absolute piece of garbage. DO NOT BUY IT. Not only did I get half the speed I've been getting on the TP Link mini WiFi adapter I just purchased to replace it, which was 1/4 the price, but Netgear's AWFUL proprietary drivers kept causing blue screen errors. Moreover, their technical support is absolutely worthless. DO NOT BUY THIS HORRIBLE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Harry G.

customer_reviews.title: Really good reception.
customer_reviews.text: Had my doubts at first. Last time I purchased a wi-fi receiver, it was a sizeable Net Gear remote that connected with a coax cable. Worked well but was large and a bit pricey. This USB Net Gear was literally plug and play. Small, inexpensive and no issue with connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: santafepedro

customer_reviews.title: Works Flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Needed to update my Wi-Fi USB adapter, and the AC1200 installed and worked flawlessly, and is noticeably faster than the one that was replaced. The instructions were clear and easy to follow, and there was no need to contact tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Shun Takano

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product....
customer_reviews.text: Not bad...highly priced than competitors but nothing extraordinary in delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Tiku Tiku

customer_reviews.title: Nice dongle - wifi signal is a bit weak
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dongle but the wifi signal, empirically, is weaker than other wifi devices.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Goryunov

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded driver from the netgear website and am getting good speeds. Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Collins10111

customer_reviews.title: signal better
customer_reviews.text: signal better, isp provider options very limited in my area.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT765

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done
customer_reviews.text: ZSimple plug and play. You do need to reboot after installation.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Loaded speed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent combination with a 1200 router, doubled the speed on my connections
customer_reviews.author: R Santiago

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased
customer_reviews.text: I like it for league of legends, it did improvey ping since there's so many devices connected to the wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm right out of the box. Compact (of course) and I really like the visual indicator. Will be buying a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NETGEAR AC1200 WiFi USB Adapter is great for connecting an older PC to the internet.
customer_reviews.text: The Netgear Wi-Fi Adapter was easy to install. it provides my household with a very fast internet connection. After switching my TV provider from Direct TV to Xfinity my old HP desktop computer, which does not have a modem card, was not able to connect to the internet. This adapter was exactly what I needed. I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: NETGEAR AC1200 WiFi USB Adapter works Great! Easy Purchase & Install
customer_reviews.text: Purchased, easily installed. I had no issues with this Net gear product. It's my second wifi product purchase this year. Great brand. 5 Stars is the only rating if no issues are encountered! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: JOHN DUHAN JR

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My Microsoft Pro’s wireless driver stopped working, and the store was unable to fix it. This small device brought me back online, with faster than before connection speed.
customer_reviews.author: Stelio Kontos

product_meta.title: NETGEAR AC1200 WiFi USB Adapter – USB 2.0 Dual Band, Compatible with Windows and Mac (A6150)
product_meta.description: The NETGEAR AC1200 WiFi Dual Band Adapter wirelessly connects your notebook or desktop computer to an 11ac network for applications such as lag-free, HD streams throughout your home, online gaming and a secure and reliable connection to the Internet. It is compatible with next generation WiFi devices and backward compatible with 802.11 a/b/g/n devices. The AC1200 WiFi Adapter delivers speeds up to 300/867Mbps† and dual band WiFi technology reduces interference for better connections to more WiFi devices.
feature_bullets: Easily upgrade your existing laptop or desktop computer's WiFi to high-performance WiFi
Dual Band AC WiFi Speed up to 1200Mbps
Works with 802.11 a/b/g/n and ac WiFi routers
Multi-User MIMO for faster data transfer with all capable routers
Compatibility: Windows OS or Mac OS computer, USB1.1/USB2.0 compatible, Microsoft Windows 7, 8, 10: (32/64-bit), Mac OS 10.9~10.13

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars64 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
